entries.title: Dems Vote to Release Trump's Tax Returns, and It May Come Back to Bite Them
entries.description: Republicans and legal experts said the decision by House investigators could establish a precedent in which anyone's returns could be made public.

entries.title: Republican Warning About SCOTUS Tax Returns Backfires: 'I'd Like to See'
entries.description: Rep. Kevin Brady warned that the public release of former President Donald Trump's tax returns could lead to similar disclosures about Supreme Court justices.

entries.title: Florida Iguanas Could Fall From Trees on Christmas Weekend
entries.description: Although they may look lifeless, they're actually still alive.
